bayes

Class VariableSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes.VariableSet

  • public class VariableSet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents represents a set of attribute/value pairs. This is a component of Bayes net query objects.
    Author:
    matthewbernstein

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<pair.Pair<Attribute,java.lang.Integer>> variables
      Each pair of integers represents an Attribute ID and the nominal value ID of the attribute of all of the variables in this set.

    • Method Detail

      • addVariable

        public void addVariable(Attribute attr,
               java.lang.Integer nomValueId)
        Add an attribute/value pair to the set of attribute/value pairs to this set.
        Parameters:
        attr - the ID of the condition attribute to be added to the set
        nominalValueId - the nominal value ID specified for this Attribute

      • containsAttribute

        public java.lang.Boolean containsAttribute(Attribute attr)
        Determines whether this set includes the value of a specific attribute in the set of attributes
        Parameters:
        attr - the target Attribute
        Returns:
        true if this set has a value for this specific attribute

      • getValueForAttribute

        public java.lang.Integer getValueForAttribute(Attribute attr)
        Gets the value for a specific attribute in the set of attributes. If this attribute is not in this set, this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        attr - the target Attribute
        Returns:
        the value of target Attribute specified in the of the query. null if this Attribute is not specified in this query

      • getVariables

        public java.util.ArrayList<pair.Pair<Attribute,java.lang.Integer>> getVariables()
        Returns:
        the list of attribute/value pairs in this joint probability query. Each pair is the ID of the attribute and the nominal value ID of the value of this attribute.

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
